summary: Implements the Stwfsapy backend for the Annif automatic subject indexing system. The module defines a backend class that initializes the Stwfsapy predictor, manages model files, supports training and incremental updates with document‑subject data, and produces ranked subject suggestions for incoming texts. It also handles configuration validation and raises appropriate exceptions when the model is not ready or an operation is unsupported.
business_intent: Enable users of the Annif platform to train and apply a Stwfsapy‑based classification model for automatically assigning subject headings to documents, improving indexing efficiency and consistency.
